GlobX.metaDescription: Introducing GlobX, an AI-powered automated trading bot.
GlobX.heroTagline: The most efficient and transparent risk minimization system
GlobX.featuresMainDescLine1: AI-based automated trading system monitors the market 24/7 and executes trades at optimal timing.
GlobX.featuresMainDescLine2: Leave complex market analysis to GlobX.
GlobX.feature1Desc: Provides various trading strategies to respond to market volatility and maximize profits.
GlobX.feature2Desc: It never stops until profit is realized, capturing market opportunities without missing out.
GlobX.feature3Desc: Trades while safely protecting assets with top-level security systems.
GlobX.firstTimeCard1Desc: Even while you sleep, GlobX monitors the market and captures optimal trading opportunities.
GlobX.firstTimeCard2Desc: Generates profits through automation without complex chart analysis or market monitoring.
GlobX.case1Desc: Even during busy work life, GlobX automatically proceeds with trading to generate stable and steady profits.
GlobX.case2Desc: Managing assets very safely and simply with an interface that is easy for beginner investors to use.
GlobX.faqA1: Yes, GlobX encrypts and stores API keys, and uses only trading permissions without withdrawal permissions to safely protect assets.
GlobX.faqA2: It uses AI algorithms based on various technical indicators such as Moving Averages, RSI, and Bollinger Bands.
GlobX.faqQ3: Is it possible to trade coins other than Bitcoin?
GlobX.faqA3: Yes, it supports major altcoin trading such as Ethereum and Ripple, and users can set desired coins.
GlobX.faqQ4: Is it available on both PC and mobile?
GlobX.faqA4: Yes, responsive web design provides optimized screens on all devices including PC, tablet, and mobile.
GlobX.faqQ5: Is there any case of fund loss?
GlobX.faqA5: All investments carry risks. However, the AI is designed to minimize losses through Stop-loss functions.
GlobX.faqQ6: How much does it cost to operate?
GlobX.faqA6: In addition to the basic bot usage fee, exchange fees may apply. Please refer to the pricing page for details.
